short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically close the current YouTube tab when your video ends.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take control of your endless YouTube binges! For when you should be working or finally going to sleep, and your willpower has depleted.

Last Video I Swear, when activated, will darken the area around your YouTube video and make the rest of the page unclickable (keeping the related video section out of reach). When your video finishes, the extension will take care of the hardest part, and close the tab for you.

Attempts to refresh the page or redirect would be futile, and the tab will be closed also.
